definition: one's physique (tall or short, thin or fat)/stature

sentences.english: The length of the bar stands for quantity.
sentences.chinese: 用直條的高矮來表示數量的多少。

sentences.english: The two brothers are about the same height.
The teacher paired off his students by age and height.
sentences.chinese: 老師根據年齡和高矮將學生分成一對一對。

sentences.english: The two trees are about the same height.
Am I comfortable working with people of all shapes and sizes?
sentences.chinese: 我能和各種高矮胖瘦的人做搭檔嗎？

sentences.english: The twins are unequal in height.
sentences.chinese: 這一對孿生兒高矮紛歧樣。

sentences.english: Fat, thin, tall, short are words of uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: 胖瘦高矮同樣是不確定的詞。

sentences.english: EG: The children lined up on the ground according to height.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們按高矮在操場上排成一行。

sentences.english: Paper cutting height with the Shadow trash at the side.
sentences.chinese: 剪紙與皮影分別在高矮垃圾桶的側面。

sentences.english: In fact, sub-height with heart disease are related.
sentences.chinese: 原來，個子高矮與心臟的疾病有關係。

sentences.english: The teacher placed the children in order of height.
sentences.chinese: 老師按照學生個子的高矮把他們排好隊。

definition: one's physique (tall or short, thin or fat)/stature
to favor one and discriminate against the other (abbr. for 厚此薄彼[hou4 ci3 bo2 bi3])
thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work
a person of short stature/a short person
